birth_place.zh-cn: 日本东京都千代田区皇居宫内厅医院
birth_place.en: Imperial Household Agency Hospital, Tokyo Imperial Palace, Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan

description.zh-cn: 日本国第126代天皇，年号为“令和”。为上皇明仁与上皇后美智子的长子。
description.en: The 126th Emperor of Japan, his reign name is 'Reiwa'. He is the eldest son of Emperor Emeritus Akihito and Empress Emerita Michiko.

description.zh-cn: 日本第125代天皇，现为上皇。德仁天皇的父亲。
description.en: The 125th Emperor of Japan, currently the Emperor Emeritus. Father of Emperor Naruhito.

description.zh-cn: 明仁上皇的皇后，现为上皇后。德仁天皇的母亲。她是首位嫁入日本皇室的平民。
description.en: The wife of Emperor Emeritus Akihito, currently the Empress Emerita. Mother of Emperor Naruhito. She was the first commoner to marry into the Japanese Imperial Family.

description.zh-cn: 日本现任皇后，德仁天皇的妻子。
description.en: The current Empress of Japan, wife of Emperor Naruhito.

description.zh-cn: 德仁天皇与雅子皇后的独女。
description.en: The only child of Emperor Naruhito and Empress Masako.

description.zh-cn: 德仁天皇的弟弟，现任皇嗣。
description.en: The younger brother of Emperor Naruhito and the current Crown Prince of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 德仁天皇的妹妹，前日本公主。
description.en: The younger sister of Emperor Naruhito, a former princess of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇，德仁天皇的祖父。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan, grandfather of Emperor Naruhito.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇的皇后，德仁天皇的祖母。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Shōwa, grandmother of Emperor Naruhito.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的一所私立大学，德仁天皇在此获得了学士和硕士学位。
description.en: A private university in Tokyo, Japan, where Emperor Naruhito obtained his bachelor's and master's degrees.

description.zh-cn: 牛津大学的组成学院之一，德仁天皇曾于1983年至1985年在此研究。
description.en: One of the constituent colleges of the University of Oxford, where Emperor Naruhito studied from 1983 to 1985.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国牛津的世界顶尖公立研究型大学，授予德仁天皇名誉法学博士学位。
description.en: A world-leading public research university in Oxford, England, which awarded Emperor Naruhito an honorary Doctor of Laws degree.

description.zh-cn: 日本的国家红十字会，德仁在皇太子时期担任其名誉副总裁。
description.en: The national Red Cross society of Japan, for which Naruhito served as Honorary Vice-President during his time as Crown Prince.

nodes.id: 联合国水与卫生咨询委员会

zh-cn: 联合国水与卫生咨询委员会
en: UN Secretary-General's Advisory Board on Water and Sanitation

description.zh-cn: 联合国秘书处的咨询机构，德仁担任其名誉总裁。
description.en: An advisory board to the United Nations Secretary-General, for which Naruhito serves as Honorary President.

description.zh-cn: 日本天皇的正式居所，位于东京都千代田区。德仁天皇在此出生和居住。
description.en: The primary residence of the Emperor of Japan, located in Chiyoda, Tokyo. Emperor Naruhito was born and resides here.

description.zh-cn: 已故英国女王。
description.en: The late Queen of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 日本的皇室家族。
description.en: The ruling family of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 德仁出生于皇居内的宫内厅医院。
description.en: Naruhito was born at the Imperial Household Agency Hospital within the Imperial Palace.

description.zh-cn: 祖父昭和天皇为德仁命名为“浩宫德仁”。
description.en: His grandfather, Emperor Shōwa, named him 'Hironomiya Naruhito'.

description.zh-cn: 毕业于学习院大学文学部史学科。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of History, Faculty of Letters, Gakushuin University.

description.zh-cn: 修完学习院大学院大学院人文研究科博士前期课程。
description.en: Completed the first part of the doctoral program in humanities at the Graduate School of Gakushuin University.

description.zh-cn: 进入牛津大学墨顿学院，研究泰晤士河水路运输史。
description.en: Studied at Merton College, Oxford, researching the history of water transport on the River Thames.

description.zh-cn: 牛津大学授予德仁名誉法学博士学位。
description.en: The University of Oxford awarded Naruhito an honorary Doctor of Laws degree.

description.zh-cn: 于其父明仁在2019年4月30日退位后，继任为第126代天皇。
description.en: Succeeded his father, Akihito, as the 126th Emperor after Akihito's abdication on April 30, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 在皇太子时期担任日本赤十字社名誉副总裁。
description.en: Served as Honorary Vice-President of the Japanese Red Cross Society during his time as Crown Prince.

relationships.target: 联合国水与卫生咨询委员会

description.zh-cn: 与雅子皇后一同出席已故英国女王伊莉莎白二世的国葬。
description.en: Attended the state funeral of the late Queen Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom, alongside Empress Masako.

description.zh-cn: 会见到访的美国总统唐纳·川普。
description.en: Met with visiting U.S. President Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 因嫁入日本皇室，原为天主教徒的美智子改宗神道教。
description.en: Due to her marriage into the Imperial House of Japan, Michiko, who was originally a Catholic, converted to Shinto.
